mapper.sql: id as id, teach_time as teachTime, create_time as createTime, course_rule_id as courseRuleId
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_course_rule_time
teach_time = #{teachTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
course_rule_id = #{courseRuleId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_jw_course_rule_time
teach_time = #{map.teachTime},
create_time = #{map.createTime},
course_rule_id = #{map.courseRuleId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_course_rule_time
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND teach_time like CONCAT('%', #{condition.teachTime} , '%')
AND create_time like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createTime} , '%')
AND course_rule_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.courseRuleId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
